urls.title: Coronavirus disease (COVID-19)
urls.description: Latest update 13 May 2021 - WHO is continuously monitoring and responding to this pandemic. This Q&A will be updated as more is known about COVID-19, how it spreads and how it is affecting people worldwide. For more information, regularly check the WHO coronavirus pages. https://www.who.int/covid-19

text:
@WHOWPRO @WHOSEARO @pahowho @WHO_Europe @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO Q: Who is at risk of developing severe symptoms from #2019nCoV? 
A: https://t.co/j6HsqP9iJb https://t.co/LcAOSfoNMx

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
